thread.title: Nayanthara dubs for the first time
thread.title_full: Nayanthara dubs for the first time - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Nayanthara dubs for the first time
text:
It took leading southern actress Nayanthara a decade to finally dub in her own voice for upcoming Tamil film 'Naanum Rowdy Dhaan', in which she plays a hearing impaired character. Her fans got a glimpse of her mouthing Tamil lines in her own voice in the film's teaser that was unveiled on Friday.
According to a source from the film's unit, it was at the behest of director Vignesh Shivan, whom Nayanthara is rumoured to be dating, she agreed to dub in her voice. "Nayanthara was never interested to dub in her voice, but she eventually agreed for the sake of her close friend and director Vignesh," said a source.
Also starring Vijay Sethupathi, the film is produced by actor Dhanush and is gearing up for release soon.
